summary: This is a memorandum from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York dated August 12, 2019, documenting a shift handover note from August 9, 2019. It states that inmate Jeffrey Epstein would need a cellmate upon returning from an attorney visit, and that inmate Reyes was going to the WAB (likely a housing unit) and might not return.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Identified as inmate #76318-054 who was returning from an attorney visit and would need a cellmate.

persons.name: Reyes
persons.context: Identified as inmate #85993-054 who was going to the WAB (likely a housing unit) and might not return.

events.title: Shift Handover Note Regarding Inmates
events.description: A note was passed during a shift handover at the Metropolitan Correctional Center indicating inmate Reyes was going to the WAB and might not return, and that inmate Epstein would need a cellmate upon returning from an attorney visit.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, New York
keyFacts: The document is dated August 12, 2019, and references events from August 9, 2019.
Jeffrey Epstein was an inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York under inmate number 76318-054.
On August 9, 2019, Epstein was returning from an attorney visit and was to be assigned a cellmate.
Another inmate, Reyes (#85993-054), was noted as going to the WAB and possibly not returning.
The document is a memorandum recording internal prison communications regarding inmate status and housing.
